exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type A : list X p : X -> Prop X0 : forall x : X, dec (p x) Unable to unify "{forall x : ?M1508, x el ?M1509 -> ?M1510 x} + {~ (forall x : ?M1508, x el ?M1509 -> ?M1510 x)}" with "{exists x : X, x el A /\\ p x} + {~ (exists x : X, x el A /\\ p x)}".

original: intros. intros H. apply list_forall_dec. - apply H. - intros x. apply dec_DM_and. + apply list_in_dec. + apply dec. - apply cfind.
